title: strange difference in annotate-path
body:
```shell
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl[master]git
$> datalad annotate-paths -d . --modified datalad-public/master -r           
annotate_path(): crcns (dataset)
annotate_path(): openfmri (dataset)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000138 (dataset)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000221 (dataset)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000222 (dataset)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000223 (dataset)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000138/.datalad/meta/meta.json (file)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000221/.datalad/meta/meta.json (file)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000222/.datalad/meta/meta.json (file)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000223/.datalad/meta/meta.json (file)
datalad annotate-paths -d . --modified datalad-public/master -r  6.43s user 8.15s system 22% cpu 1:04.53 total
(dev)1 11485.....................................:Fri 02 Jun 2017 09:45:30 AM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl[master]git
$> git diff --stat datalad-public/master
 crcns    | 0
 openfmri | 2 +-
 2 files changed, 1 insertion(+), 1 deletion(-)
(dev)1 11486.....................................:Fri 02 Jun 2017 09:45:47 AM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl[master]git
$> datalad annotate-paths -d . --modified HEAD^..HEAD -r    
annotate_path(): openfmri (dataset)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000138 (dataset)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000221 (dataset)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000222 (dataset)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000223 (dataset)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000138/.datalad/meta/meta.json (file)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000221/.datalad/meta/meta.json (file)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000222/.datalad/meta/meta.json (file)
annotate_path(): openfmri/ds000223/.datalad/meta/meta.json (file)
(dev)1 11487.....................................:Fri 02 Jun 2017 09:46:15 AM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl[master]git
$> git show datalad-public/master | head
commit 50628108635d263fe77400bcee3cda3dc3311f6a
Author: Yaroslav Halchenko <debian@onerussian.com>
Date:   Thu May 25 11:29:22 2017 -0400

    [DATALAD] aggregated meta data

diff --git a/.datalad/meta/corr/meta.json b/.datalad/meta/corr/meta.json
index a79d4ba..fe275c3 100644
--- a/.datalad/meta/corr/meta.json
+++ b/.datalad/meta/corr/meta.json
(dev)1 11488.....................................:Fri 02 Jun 2017 09:46:25 AM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl[master]git
$> git show HEAD^ | head                
commit 50628108635d263fe77400bcee3cda3dc3311f6a
Author: Yaroslav Halchenko <debian@onerussian.com>
Date:   Thu May 25 11:29:22 2017 -0400

    [DATALAD] aggregated meta data

diff --git a/.datalad/meta/corr/meta.json b/.datalad/meta/corr/meta.json
index a79d4ba..fe275c3 100644
--- a/.datalad/meta/corr/meta.json
+++ b/.datalad/meta/corr/meta.json
```
